Class LcarsApp.DesktopCanvas

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
LcarsApp.DesktopCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Enclosing class:
LcarsApp
private static class LcarsApp.DesktopCanvas extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane
Desktop canvas showing movable LCARS tiles for files currently on the user's Desktop.

Tiles remember their (x,y) positions and are persisted to ~/.lcars_desktop.txt. Dragging a tile onto the trash target attempts to move the backing file back to its origin directory.

  • Constructor Details

    • DesktopCanvas

      DesktopCanvas()
      Initializes the canvas and the trash target; keeps trash anchored at bottom-left.

  • Method Details

    • layoutTrash

      private void layoutTrash()
      Positions the trash region at bottom-left with margins.

    • addIcon

      void addIcon(File fileOnDesktop, File originDir)
      Adds a tile for a file on Desktop at a random free-ish spot.
      Parameters:
      fileOnDesktop - file located on Desktop
      originDir - the directory it came from (nullable)

    • addIcon

      private void addIcon(File fileOnDesktop, File originDir, double x, double y)
      Adds a tile at a specific (x,y) and clamps to canvas bounds.

    • removeTileFor

      void removeTileFor(File f)
      Removes a tile for the given Desktop file (if present).

    • onFileMoved

      void onFileMoved(File src, File dst)
      Synchronization hook: call after a move. Removes tile if file left Desktop, or adds one if it entered.

    • safePath

      private String safePath(File f)
      Canonical path when possible, else absolute.

    • saveState

      void saveState()
      Persists tiles to the state file: filePath|originPath|x|y per line. Swallows IO problems (best-effort persistence).

    • loadState

      void loadState()
      Loads tiles from the state file if the files still exist on Desktop. Skips malformed lines.
